content:
# My inventory still shows that I have 10 stone and 10 iron ore, which means I have the necessary materials to build the stone furnace.
# However, the persistent issue with the environment reporting my position incorrectly is preventing me from placing any entities.

# As a next step, I will try to reset my position again and see if I can find a valid build location by moving to a new area entirely.
# I will move to a different coordinate, such as (5, 5), to see if this helps reset the environment's state.

move_to(Position(5, 5))  # Moving to a new position (5, 5) to reset the environment.
